changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton permettant de désinsta: Added a button to uninstall a local Mosquitto broker on the general plugin configuration page

index.md.permet de connecter Jeedom à un broker M: allows you to connect Jeedom to an existing MQTT broker or to install one locally or under Docker using the plugin
index.md.Ce plugin est en mesure de cumuler plusi: This plugin is able to combine several features
index.md.Servir de socle aux autres plugins pour: Serve as a base for other plugins for everything related to MQTT
index.md.Servir en mode \"standalone\" par la cré: Serve in "standalone" mode by creating action/info commands for sending/receiving messages on MQTT
index.md.Piloter Jeedom depuis un autre équipemen: Control Jeedom from another MQTT equipment
index.md.Le plugin peut aussi bien piloter des co: The plugin can both drive commands and retransmit all Jeedom events on MQTT
index.md.Après installation et activation du plug: After installing and activating the plugin, the installation of dependencies should start unless automatic management has been disabled beforehand
index.md.Dans ce cas, il faudra cliquer sur le bo: In this case, you will have to click on the button
index.md.Pour commencer la configuration du plugi: To start the configuration of the plugin, it is necessary to select the mode of connection to the broker among the 3 possible choices
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé directe: The Mosquitto broker is installed directly on the machine that hosts Jeedom
index.md.Le broker Mosquitto est installé et conf: The Mosquitto broker is automatically installed and configured in a Docker container using the official plugin
index.md.Dans ce mode, l'installation peut durer: In this mode, the installation can take several minutes
index.md.Dans le cas de l'utilisation d'un broker: In the case of the use of an already existing broker, it is enough to fill in its address
index.md.Une fois le broker Mosquitto installé: Once the Mosquitto broker is installed
index.md.vous pouvez passer à la suite de la conf: you can continue with the configuration
index.md.Vous pouvez spécifier des utilisateurs\/: You can specify users / password for connection
index.md.en mode local vous pouvez renseigner un: in local mode you can enter a `username
index.md.mot de passe` par ligne, chaque couple d: password` per line, each pair of identifiers will have valid access to the broker
index.md.S'il n'existe aucun identifiant, Jeedom: If there is no identifier, Jeedom creates one automatically
index.md.en mode standalone il suffit de mettre s: in standalone mode it is enough to put on the first line the couple ` identifier
index.md.si le nom d'utilisateur est `jeedom`et l: if the username is `jeedom` and the password `mqtt`, you must fill in `jeedom
index.md.L'authentification est obligatoire en mo: Authentication is mandatory in local mode
index.md.Sujet racine pour envoyer une commande à: Root topic to send a command to Jeedom or on which it sends the events
index.md.Cocher la case pour envoyer tous les évè: Check the box to send all Jeedom command events on MQTT
index.md.Mise en forme de la publication des évèn: Formatting the publication of Jeedom events * (possible tags
index.md.Liste des plugins abonnés au plugin MQTT: List of plugins subscribed to the MQTT Manager plugin in the form `plugin(topic)`
index.md.Il est possible de créer des équipements: It is possible to create MQTT equipment directly in the plugin
index.md.Il faut indiquer le topic racine de l'éq: You must indicate the root topic of the equipment
index.md.ensuite selon le type de commandes: then according to the type of commands
index.md.Pour exemple, si vous mettez `toto\/1`,: For example, if you put `toto/1`, all the messages on the topic `test/toto/1` will be automatically written on the command in question
index.md.Le système est capable de gérer les cham: The system is able to manage json type fields, in this case you have to put `toto/1
index.md.key2` pour descendre d'un niveau: key2` to go down one level
index.md.Il faut absolument que l'arrivée corresp: It is absolutely necessary that the arrival corresponds to a value
index.md.il suffit d'indiquer le topic et le mess: just indicate the topic and the message
index.md.Pour exemple, si vous mettez `toto\/2` a: For example, if you put `toto/2` with the message `plop`, each click on the command will send the message `plop` to the topic `test/toto/2`
index.md.Dans les commandes de type action vous p: In action type commands you can use the tags `
index.md.` qui seront automatiquement remplacés p: ` which will be automatically replaced by their value when executing the command
index.md.D'autre part, si le message est de type: On the other hand, if the message is of the `json` type, you must add the `json` prefix to it
index.md.à adapter si vous avez modifié la config: to adapt if you have modified the default configuration
index.md.Il est possible de piloter Jeedom à trav: It is possible to pilot Jeedom through MQTT
index.md.Ci-après les différents topics possibles: Here are the different possible topics assuming that the root topic is `jeedom`
index.md.permet d'exécuter la commande portant l': allows you to execute the command with the id `
index.md.`. Vous pouvez passer les paramètres dan: `. You can pass the parameters in the message as `json` fields depending on the subtype of the command, for example
index.md.vous pouvez directement envoyer une vale: you can directly send a value or also specify an update date
index.md.demande de la valeur de la commande port: request value of command with id `
index.md.` avec en message un `json` contenant di: ` with a `json` message containing different information including the value of the command
index.md.2 options possibles pour désinstaller le: 2 possible options to uninstall the Mosquitto broker present locally on the machine
index.md.Vous pouvez ensuite supprimer cet équipe: You can then delete this entire equipment
index.md.Il faut alors utiliser le bouton rouge: You must then use the red button
